title: I need 16 blue essence for m6 draven broporo pls help

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I'll draw you whatever you want, I already have a magnificent one of pool party draven

replies.body:
Ayyyyy that's a sweet Draven right there! Since Pool Party Draven actually holds a rather special place in this poro's heart, you miiiiiiiiight find that you already have the essence you need!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
